issue.title: [Plasma] operator[] creates entries in map
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2595](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2595). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
- Problem
  
   \*\* Using object_get_requests_[object_id] will produce a lot of garbage data in PlasmaStore::return_from_get. During the measurement process, we found that there was a lot of memory growth in this point.
   \* Solution
  
   \*\* Use iterator instead of operator []

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2595?focusedCommentId=16478481) by Philipp Moritz (pcmoritz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2056
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2056>
